name: Alibaba Cloud ECS instance release protection is disabled
description:
This policy identifies ECS instances for which release protection is disabled. Enabling release protection for these ECS instances prevents irreversible data loss resulting from accidental or malicious operations.
Note: This attribute applies to Pay-As-You-Go instances only. Release protection can only restrict the manual release operation and does not apply for release operation done by Alibaba Cloud.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'alibaba_cloud' AND api.name = 'alibaba-cloud-ecs-instance' AND json.rule = status equals Running and instanceChargeType equals PostPaid and deletionProtection is false
recommendation:
1. Login to Alibaba Cloud Portal
2. Go to Elastic Compute Service
3. In the left-side navigation pane, click 'Instances'
4. Select the reported ECS instance, select More -> Instance Settings -> Change Release Protection Setting -> Release Protection (Toggle to enable)
5. Click on 'OK'
